context:
Listener: hello ! i am at work in the coffee shop . do you work ?

Speaker: cool . have you heard the band hop along ? they are pretty good .
Listener: no . but speaking of likes , reading true crime books is my passion
Speaker: interesting . are you reading one now ?
Listener: no . grad school is taking up all my time . i am in it now .
Speaker: haha . so maybe grad school is your passion ? take a true crime class ?
Listener: no . it is something i have to do . i love reading those books about true crime
Speaker: oh , ok . guess i should have said forensics class .
Listener: do you like coffee ? caramel cappuccino is my favorite drink .
Speaker: well , i never turn down a hot cup . especially during rehearsals .

Speaker: sure , i will visit . get some caramel cappuccino ! i am down for that .
question: What does Speaker want to do next?
a1: to ask listener for recommendations on true crime books to read during their downtime.
a2: say goodbye
